content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The landlord, Peter Schmidt, was seeking a higher rental price than I was willing to pay. I had to offer up to 750 euros per month, but he still indicated that he was looking for more.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the likeability as a 7? Is there anything specific that influenced your rating?
name: Evaluator

content: My rating of 7 was influenced by the professional and courteous manner in which the negotiation was conducted. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, was clear and direct in his communication, which facilitated the negotiation process. However, the ongoing disagreement over the rental price might have slightly influenced the lower rating.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
